item.title: 斯塔默表示英国不会将资本利得税提高到 39% 之高
item.description: 英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）表示，关于英国政府正在考虑将资本利得税提高至 39% 的猜测是 "离谱的"。【原文：Prime Minister Keir Starmer said speculation that the UK government was considering raising capital gains tax as high as 39% was “wide of the mark.”】

item.title: 能源部门业绩不佳，信实集团利润不及预期
item.description: 亿万富翁穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）控制的信实工业有限公司（Reliance Industries Ltd.）公布的利润再次低于分析师的预期，原因是其核心炼油业务的利润率疲软，超过了电信资费上涨带来的好处。【原文：Reliance Industries Ltd., controlled by billionaire Mukesh Ambani, reported profit that again missed analysts’ estimates, as weak margins from its core oil refining business outweighed the benefits trickling in from higher telecom tariffs.】

item.title: 受到密切关注的合同到期，铝业挤压加剧
item.description: 伦敦金属交易所铝市场的挤压正在接近尾声，在过去两个交易日的一波抛售之后，10月份期货的高溢价正在消失。【原文：A squeeze in the London Metal Exchange aluminum market is drawing to a close, with a hefty premium for October futures disappearing after a wave of selling over the past two trading days.】

item.title: Adobe 推出人工智能视频生成器，与 OpenAI 和 Meta 展开竞争
item.description: Adobe 公司发布了可创建和修改视频的人工智能工具，与大型科技公司和初创企业一道，试图利用对新兴技术的需求。【原文：Adobe Inc. unveiled artificial intelligence tools that can create and modify videos, joining Big Tech companies and startups in trying to capitalize on demand for the emerging technology.】

item.title: 刚果取消石油和天然气许可申请，计划重新启动竞标
item.description: 刚果民主共和国石油部长艾梅-萨孔比-莫伦多（Aime Sakombi Molendo）表示，该国取消了两年多前发布的 27 个石油区块的招标。【原文：Democratic Republic of Congo canceled a call for bids for 27 oil blocks that it issued more than two years ago, according to Oil Minister Aime Sakombi Molendo.】

item.title: BC Partners 称私募股权投资不应贪婪于 IPO
item.description: 资产管理公司 BC Partners 认为，私募股权公司应在估值方面做出让步，并为新上市项目留出资金，以便在目前的 "买方市场 "中取得成功。【原文：Private equity firms should compromise on valuation and leave money on the table for new listings to succeed in what is currently a “buyer’s market,” according to asset manager BC Partners.】

item.title: 南非不断增加的燃料进口引发供应短缺风险
item.description: 国有物流公司 Transnet SOC Ltd.表示，南非迅速转变为燃料净进口国，这带来了供应风险，需要基础设施来储存和运输燃料。【原文：South Africa’s rapid switch to become a net importer of fuel creates supply risks requiring infrastructure to store and transport the fuel, according to state-owned logistics firm Transnet SOC Ltd.】

item.title: 东京地铁首次公开募股将筹资 23 亿美元，创日本六年来最大上市纪录
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，东京地铁公司的首次公开募股已募集到 3,486 亿日元（23 亿美元）资金，此前该公司的股票定价达到了市场范围的最高点，这表明日本六年来最大的上市需求十分旺盛。【原文：Tokyo Metro Co.’s initial public offering has raised ¥348.6 billion ($2.3 billion) after the company priced shares at the top of the marketed range, people familiar with the matter said, in a show of hot demand for Japan’s biggest listing in six years.】

item.title: 印度通胀率创九个月新高令印度央行保持警惕
item.description: 印度 9 月份通胀加速的速度超过了预期，这证明在降息呼声日益高涨之际，印度央行有理由保持谨慎。【原文：India’s inflation accelerated at a faster pace than expected in September, justifying the central bank’s caution as calls grow to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 新兴货币走软，交易员在评估中国经济刺激计划
item.description: 由于中国的新刺激措施未能引发对高风险资产的广泛积极情绪，发展中经济体的货币大多对美元走软。【原文：Currencies in developing economies mostly weakened to the dollar as China’s new stimulus measures failed to spark a broader positive sentiment toward riskier assets.】

item.title: 埃利奥特要求西南航空公司召开特别会议
item.description: 据知情人士透露，埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）已通知美国西南航空公司（Southwest Airlines Co.【原文：Elliott Investment Management has informed Southwest Airlines Co. that it’s requesting a special shareholder meeting, according to people with knowledge of the matter, officially kicking off the activist investor’s first US proxy fight since 2017.】

item.title: 供应充足，欧洲债券风险降至十年最低
item.description: 衡量欧洲债券市场风险的一个关键指标已降至十年来的最低点，因为多年来困扰该地区货币市场的优质证券稀缺问题继续消散。【原文：A key measure of bond market risk in Europe has fallen to the lowest in a decade as the scarcity of high-quality securities that plagued the region’s money markets for years continues to dissipate.】

item.title: 芯片齿轮制造商 ASMPT 表示收到私有化要约
item.description: 芯片设备制造商 ASMPT Ltd. 正在就私有化要约进行早期讨论。【原文：Chip equipment maker ASMPT Ltd. is in early stage discussions over an offer to take it private.】

item.title: 休斯顿致命大火凸显 Pemex 糟糕的安全记录
item.description:
鹿园炼油厂事故造成至少两名工人死亡，35人受伤。【原文：

Accident at Deer Park refinery left at least two workers dead and another 35 people injured.

】

item.title: 英国警告今冬电力市场将首次出现紧张局面
item.description: 英国电网运营商发布了一份电力市场通知，警告称预测的供需之间没有足够的缓冲。【原文：The UK’s grid operator issued an electricity market notice warning that there isn’t enough of a buffer between predicted supply and demand.】

item.title: 欧佩克连续第三个月下调全球石油需求增长预测
item.description: 石油输出国组织（OPEC）连续第三个月下调了今明两年的石油需求增长预测，因为该组织姗姗来迟地意识到全球燃料使用放缓。【原文：OPEC trimmed its forecasts for oil demand growth this year and next for a third consecutive month as the group belatedly recognizes a slowdown in global fuel use.】

item.title: 陷入破产的批发商 True Value 将把自己出售给竞争对手
item.description: 批发商 True Value Co. 周一在特拉华州申请破产，寻求将其业务出售给竞争对手 Do it Best Corp.【原文：Wholesaler True Value Co. filed for bankruptcy in Delaware on Monday as it seeks to sell its business to rival Do it Best Corp.】

item.title: 亚马逊在雅西时代减少大起大落，降低成本
item.description: 亚马逊最近在纳什维尔举行的会议传递了有关公司未来的信息。但首先...【原文：Amazon’s recent conference in Nashville delivered a message about the company’s future. But first...】

item.title: 被通缉的尼日利亚航空公司总裁称正就欺诈案与美国合作
item.description: 拥有尼日利亚最大航空公司的尼日利亚商人艾伦-奥内马（Allen Onyema）在被美国当局指控妨碍司法公正后坚称自己是无辜的。【原文：Allen Onyema, the Nigerian businessman who owns the country’s largest airline, maintained his innocence after being indicted by US authorities on charges of obstructing justice.】

item.title: 美国银行将金融科技投资银行团队折叠为技术团队
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp. ）已将其金融科技投资银行团队并入其技术业务部门，这反映了整个行业在金融服务方面向软件的转变。【原文：Bank of America Corp. has folded its fintech investment banking team into its technology practice, reflecting the industrywide shift in financial services toward software.】

item.title: 科技明星鲍勃-李的被控凶手将向陪审团陈述自卫理由
item.description: 科技高管鲍勃-李（Bob Lee）在旧金山市中心的街道上被刺身亡的事件引起了全国的关注，一年半后，被指控杀害他的凶手即将出庭受审—；他将辩称自己是出于自卫。【原文：One and a half years after the fatal stabbing of technology executive Bob Lee on a downtown San Francisco street drew nationwide attention, his accused killer is going on trial — and is set to argue he acted in self-defense.】

item.title: 英伟达乘着激烈的布莱克韦尔需求股价再创新高
item.description: 在 Nvidia 公司成功平息了投资者对产品延期及其长期增长前景的担忧之后，该公司的股价又开始飙升。【原文：Nvidia Corp.’s shares are roaring back after the company successfully calmed investor concerns about product delays and its long-term growth prospects.】

item.title: 法国考虑向 CD&R 出售赛诺菲集团的国有股份
item.description: 赛诺菲正在与美国收购公司 Clayton Dubilier & Rice 商谈出售其消费者保健业务的事宜，法国政府正在研究包括国有控股在内的各种方案，以保护法国的就业和生产。【原文：The French government is looking at options including taking a state holding in the consumer health business that Sanofi is in talks to sell to US buyout firm Clayton Dubilier & Rice, to protect jobs and production in France.】

item.title: S&P 公司称印度企业集团将在 10 年内斥资 8000 亿美元
item.description: 根据 S&P 全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）的数据，在未来 10 年内，印度企业集团将把资本支出增加近两倍，达到 8,000 亿美元，因为它们在追求增长的同时，也要让经济走向更加绿色的未来。【原文：Indian conglomerates are poised to nearly triple capital spending to $800 billion over the next 10 years from the previous decade, according to S&P Global Ratings, as they pursue growth while putting the economy on the path to a greener future.】

item.title: 欧盟支持制裁向俄罗斯提供导弹的伊朗
item.description: 欧盟支持针对伊朗向俄罗斯提供弹道导弹的一揽子制裁措施，其中包括限制伊朗航空公司和两家采购公司的措施。【原文：The European Union backed a package of sanctions targeting Iran for providing Russia with ballistic missiles, with measures including restrictions on Iran Air and two procurement firms.】

item.title: 印度称加拿大希望就锡克教调查询问高级外交官
item.description: 印度说，加拿大当局告诉它，印度驻渥太华的最高外交官是去年锡克教活动家谋杀案调查中的 "利益相关者"，这使两国政府之间的关系进一步紧张。【原文：India said it was told by Canadian authorities that its top diplomat in Ottawa is a “person of interest” in an investigation involving the murder of a Sikh activist last year, further straining ties between the two governments.】

item.title: 中国 9 月石油进口因利润率下降和维修而放缓
item.description: 由于炼油厂利润疲软，并按计划停产检修，中国上月石油进口量下降。【原文：Chinese oil imports fell last month as refiners grappled with weak margins and shut units for planned maintenance.】

item.title: 首席执行官和分析师对 S&P 500 的盈利前景看法不一
item.description: 本季度美国公司的利润前景出现了不寻常的分歧：虽然分析师下调了预测，但公司的指导意见却指出本季度将再创佳绩。【原文：There’s an unusual divergence in Corporate America’s profit outlook this season: while analysts have cut forecasts, company guidance points to another strong quarter.】

item.title: 莫里森寻求为 12 亿英镑杠杆贷款再融资
item.description: Morrisons 正在对 12 亿英镑（16 亿美元）的杠杆贷款进行再融资，因为这家英国杂货商希望利用投资者对高收益债务的强劲需求。【原文：Morrisons is refinancing £1.2 billion ($1.6 billion) in leveraged loans as the UK grocer looks to take advantage of stronger investor demand for higher-yielding debt.】
